featureType.name: antarctic_kuband_crossover_errors
featureType.title: kuband_crossover_errors
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

latLonBoundingBox.crs: GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]]

virtualTable.name: kuband_crossover_errors
virtualTable.sql: SELECT geom, ABS(layer_elev_1-layer_elev_2) AS error FROM kuband_crossover_errors WHERE (layer_id = %layer_id% OR layer_id IS NULL) AND location_id = 2 UNION SELECT cx.geom, NULL AS error FROM kuband_crossovers cx JOIN kuband_point_paths pp ON cx.point_path_1_id=pp.id WHERE pp.location_id=2 AND cx.id NOT IN (SELECT cross_id FROM kuband_crossover_errors WHERE layer_id=%layer_id%)
